page.title: 04THE SCHOOL SYSTEM BRIDGE
page.content: I started Bridge School when I was 5 years old.Before I came to school Iwent to Mrs.Webb's Play School at Kingston. There is another Play School called Mrs.Rook's.Since I have been at school I have had two Headteachers. One called Miss Tomlin and one called Mr.Farley.My eldest brother left this School in 1982,and my sister left in 1984.They both go to Geoffrey Chaucer School in Canterbury. When my youngest brother and I leave Bridge School we will probably go to Geoffrey Chaucer. It is a Comprehensive School. This year 7 children from J4 will go to the Frank Montgomery Secondary Modern School (Sturry),6 will go to the Simon Langton Grammar School,4 will go to the Geoffrey Chaucer, 1 will go to Aylesham Sec.Mod and 1 to the Arch- bishop's Sec.Mod Canterbury,2 d'ont know which school they will go to yet.
